answer: <p>Where the result is negative, C truncates towards 0 rather than flooring - I learnt this reading about why Python integer division always floors here: <a href="http://python-history.blogspot.com/2010/08/why-pythons-integer-division-floors.html" rel="noreferrer">Why Python's Integer Division Floors</a></p>
